{{this.Username}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Databinding_Assignment'; Username='Adiiti'; isDisable:boolean=false; Reset(){ this.Username=""; this.isDisable=false; } }
